title: What is a beneficial question to ask you that would BENEFIT the Ummah? assimalhakeem JAL
transcript: Tazawer from Bangladesh Assalamu Alaikum Wa Rahmatullahi Wa Barakatuhu Sheikh Wa'alaykumussalam Wa Rahmatullahi Wa Barakatuhu What would be a useful question to ask you so we can all benefit? What can be a what? What would be a useful question to ask you so that the Ummah can benefit? The sky is the limit. You could ask me about the things that get you closer to Allah and I could spend the rest of the time talking about it. You can ask me what to avoid in nowadays age and era. What's the ruling on social media? What is the ruling on severing the ties of kinship? I haven't seen my uncle in ages. What's the ruling on looking in a frown look to my father or to my mother or disrespecting them? What are you talking about? When you ask a question, be more specific and don't give genetic questions because this is a waste of your time and my time. you you
